name: John Doe
text:
Die ist ein spezieller Ermittler zum Erstellen von generischen Decks.
[elder_sign]: +X wobei X alles sein kann, was es sein soll.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-5, Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 1 random basic weakness.
